description: awk select the first element and print it

code:
arr=()

# add elements to the array
for i in leonardo caterina bibico magkaki; do
	arr+=(${i})
done

# list all elements
echo ${add[@]}
$ leonardo caterina bibico magkaki

# list all elements one per line
printf '%s\n' "${arr[@]}"
$ leonardo
caterina
bibico
magkaki
